**{{champion:106}}   ROAR!{{item:3009}}  {{summoner:6}}  EQRW Winner!**

there are 8 teams
8x7x6x5x4x3x2x1 = 40320 different combinations..
its much less likely than it looks
i thought that would be 4c8+2c4+1=77, and u just made it worse

no 8x7x6x5x4x3x2x1 is correct because 
8 people could come last one last has been select there are 7 left so 7 could come 2nd last so that would make 56 options for just predicting last and 2nd last
its 7x6x5x4x3x2x1 because a team cant get 2 places at the same time
amazing how good ppl are at maths lmfao its 7x6x5x4x3x2x1, one team cant get two places at the same time

heres my predictions for the split from first to last: Chiefs, Dire Wolves, Legacy, Avant Garde, Immunity, Sin Gaming, Absolute, Sudden Fear. Reasoning for SF last is because they lost pretty easily to the new teams in the OCS. I feel sin gaming has an edge over absolute, and that the top 3-4 teams wont change.
ty for your picks. I hope you're right.
yeh so if 50000 players get it right you will get 2 rp ?
yeh so if 200000 players get it right you get 0.5 rp? is there such a thing?
yeah but are 50000 summoners really going to get it right
guys which team u go for any1
